title: needaya kOrithi
sahitya:
nI daya kOriti nIraja lOcani
nAdu mati niNDina karnaranjani 

anupallavi

AdarincuTaku nI sATi deivamu
lEdanucu  ninnu nEra nammiti talli 

caraNam

mAtA alarmElu mangA nIvE  jI-
vAdAra swaramandu palikincavamma
nAdAnubhava yogamandinca vamma! 
nI dAsuDanu vEganE bhrOvavamma!
